title: Low-Energy Particle experiments - electron analyzer (LEP-e) Level 2 omni electron flux data, ARASE/ERG - Shiang-Yu Wang (Academia Sinica, Taiwan)

info.x_cadence_note: Cadence based on variable 'Epoch' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/erg/lepe/l2/omniflux/2018/erg_lepe_l2_omniflux_20180301_v04_01.cdf. This most common cadence occurred for 9.7165% of the 778 timesteps. Cadence = 8000118000 [ns] = PT8.000118S.

parameters.name: FEDO_T
parameters.description: ---> FEDO as stacked time series. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['FEDO']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
